response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that I believe is worth far more than its face value. This product holds immense value to me, but I am confident it could be even more beneficial to someone like yourself who can truly appreciate and utilize its full potential.

After careful consideration, I am offering you the chance to purchase this remarkable item at a special price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its true value, and I am hopeful that we can come to an agreement that satisfies both our interests.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions regarding the product. I am more than happy to provide additional information or arrange a viewing.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
